about_the_game:
ReplayVR revolutionizes your VR experience by allowing you to effortlessly capture video clips of your virtual reality moments right after they occur, all with the convenience of your VR controllers. Gone are the days of pre-setting recording software. With ReplayVR, you can seamlessly save and relive your immersive adventures.

This innovative software effortlessly records your VR headset display, along with the option to capture your microphone and game audio. ReplayVR stores the video and audio in memory, ready to be preserved at your command. Simply press the designated button combination on your VR controller, and a high-quality video file of your recent visual and auditory encounter will be saved.

Key Features:

  • Intuitive and user-friendly interface designed for effortless navigation.
  • Out-of-the-box configuration optimized to suit a wide range of scenarios.
  • Real-time recording with efficient, high performance, using cutting-edge formats compatible with web standards.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 2600X or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR only, Valve Index controllers or better
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: ReplayVR gives you the ability to take video screenshots of what you see in VR after you saw it.
supported_languages: English, German, Japanese, Korean, Russian, Simplified Chinese
